author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`. Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

 - [CMSHLT-2187](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2187): updates for Run-3 tracking, incl. CPU part of new heterogeneous pixel local reco, and pixel tracking+vertexing
 - [CMSHLT-2206](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2206): addition of paths `Status_OnCPU` and `Status_OnGPU`
 - [CMSHLT-2207](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2207): CPU part of heterogeneous ECAL local reco
 - [CMSHLT-2208](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2208): CPU part of heterogeneous HCAL local reco

The PR also includes a syntax improvement suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36536#discussion_r772528120 (credits: @perrotta).

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X`
